turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like you to place an order at Starbucks for coffee for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks would you like it from

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Orange City, Fl.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what would you like.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a caramel macchiato

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like me to get you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a venti please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want milk in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can you ask for 2% milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like anything else with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you ask them to put a bit of whipped cream on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can do that for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, can you ask them to put a drop of vanilla syrup in it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can definitely do that for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And can u ask them for it to be light and sweet.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, and would you like extra sugar on the side.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that would be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The drink has been ordered from the Orange City store and will be ready shortly

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, appreciate that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, and your receipt will be sent to your phone

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks for all your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anytime have a great day.
